name: .GSBA File Extension
summary: Learn about .GSBA files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Archive created by GameSave Manager, a program that locates saved game files and backs them up; contains saved game files from your computer detected by GameSave Manager.

content: To create a GSBA file, select "Make a backup" under "Backing up...," check the box next to the file in the left pane that you'd like to back up, select the "Start the Backup Task now" icon, choose the save location, and click OK.

To restore a GSBA file, select "Open Archive(s)" under "Restoring data...," navigate to the location of your GSBA file, click Open, check the box next to the file in the left pane that you'd like to restore, select the "Start the Restore Task now" icon, and click OK.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
